messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Something is not right with this.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Sensors indicate you guys are giving new meaning to the term "Skeleton Crew."
